page.title: 17RELIGION IN MYDDLE
page.content:
There is a{record book}in the{church to record who came to visit it.A long time ago the church had only one aisle but now it has two aisles.On a Tuesday at school the rector comes in and we have assembly.The rector has a family service in the evening at 6.30pm.
{THE CHURCH } In the{recording book}it has got people who got married,deaths,and births.Every week a church messenger goes out to tell people when the services are and other things.Some times we have a church Fete.Before today there were 51 rectors. {RICH AND POOR } The people who were rich sat at the front and the people who poor sat at the back,but that was a long time ago. Now people can sit anywhere.
